channel.title: Need help with java development kit path reading
channel.description: when i go to compile it says "cannot find the path specified" i downloaded jdk 6 update 3 and installed. i cannot load a tutorial guide because it says its off limits :\ if anyone can give me a guide or explain it would be nice=] ty

item.title: Need help with java development kit path reading
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_f0r_3v3r 0wn3d f0r 3v3r
item.description:
@0wn3d_f0r_3v3r wrote:

go to my computer right click and click on properties then go to advanced click on
Environment variables

then under environment variables you will see some stuff like this…

user variables for “USERNAME”

under that click add

then click add

set the variable as

%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe

and the name as javac.exe so it can recognize it

say 555 if it works

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with java development kit path reading

item.title: Need help with java development kit path reading
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_f0r_3v3r 0wn3d f0r 3v3r
item.description:
@0wn3d_f0r_3v3r wrote:

right click compile and click edit and replace everything with

@echo off
title Compiler
"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause

Read full topic
